__e: We're not laughin' at you, Professor, we're laughin' with you.
But the white man does not laugh with the women of other men.
How could I be with someone that doesn't laugh?
Have you lived this long... without knowing that everybody laughs at ya behind your back?
Two things that I just can't stand... - a man that ain't true and one that mocks what is.
You know, I have just as many feelings as you do and it hurts just as much when somebody steps all over them.
It simply laughs and cries with people.
Look, how cheerful my mother looks two hours after my father's death.
First she's crying, then she's laughing and now she's going into the house with her husband's boss.
